detail_desc: Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top. V-neck with a sewn-on bow at the front and a seam at the waist.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves, and elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fine-knit jumper in a viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede details. Tongue and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and textured rubber soles.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and hooded jacket in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a print motif on the front and press-stud on one shoulder. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Sleeveless playsuit in a gently draping weave with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back and concealed buttons down the front. Elasticated seam and a soft, detachable belt with D-rings at the waist. Short slits at the hems.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a button, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Plastic Alice band covered with glittery imitation leather and grosgrain along the inside. Butterfly-shaped chiffon and tulle appliqués on top.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top with raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short, strappy top in jersey containing glittery threads.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Loafers in imitation leather with a chunky metal chain and fringes at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave. Stand-up collar with gathers front and back, a V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an open chest pocket, buttons on the shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Three-strand metal neckline with chains in various designs. Two decorated with a metal pendant. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with ties at the neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Soft suede sandals with straps that tie around the leg and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 12.5 cm.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a concealed zip. Decorative covered buttons and a high split at one side. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired lace bralette with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace hem. Narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes and satin ribbon ties.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and a button band with decorative buttons down the front. Gently flared with an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Adjustable braces in herringbone-patterned elastic with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit with a shawl collar and draped front. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in airy jersey made from a viscose and silk blend.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with decorative, elastic stripes down the front and medium coverage at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a round neckline that has an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined top section.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Twelve pairs of studs and two pairs of hoops. Size from 0.4 cm to 2.8 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, a knot at the front and a fastener at the back.
Double-layered hat in a jacquard knit with a motif on the front.
Trousers in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Hipster briefs in ribbed jersey with a low, V-shaped waist, lace trims, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Strapless bandeau bra in soft cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. No fasteners.
Top in soft, printed jersey with short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Short, wide dress in lace with a small, frilled collar and covered buttons down the front. 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a flounce, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in underdress in lightweight jersey.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Longer blouse woven in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a small stand-up collar, and round neckline with a decorative drawstring. Concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.
Oversized top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and dropped shoulders.
Soft shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 29x35 cm unfolded.
Sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the hems.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Round neck with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck that has a small opening and decorative knot at the front. Smocked seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and culottes in a soft, textured viscose weave. V-neck top with buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Ankle-length bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped pull. Discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in airy, patterned crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the front of the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, wide trousers woven in a linen blend with a zip fly and concealed inner button. High waist with a sewn-in turnover and belt loops. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs with a pleat at the top for added volume.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Wide, off-the shoulder top in soft slub jersey with inset lace trims at the front and on the sleeves. Elastication and a short frill trim at the top, long, slightly wider sleeves with pin-tucks, and elasticated cuffs with a frill trim.
Draped blouse in satin with a sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
